title: as a colorblind person, lunar wraith caitlyns traps are invisible to me.
body:
@Riot team, im a colorblind person with protanopia as the official diagnosis of my colorblindess type and i just played against a lunar wraith caitlyn for the first time and i physically could not see her traps at all, i could barely see the red circle around where they were but i couldnt see what was inside them. could we make them a bit brighter or something because they blend in so well i can't play against this skin.


i stepped on so many traps without seeing them x_x

replies.body: git gud

hey

delete your account
Is there a way to upvote you more than once?
Upboat botnet?

I don't usually upvote.

But when I do, it's just that damn good.

No.... really???
I'd hardly imagine.
I'ma get the team to take a look at this. Thanks for the report. I realized I was somewhat colorblind too when I argued that "P2" in melee was purple, not blue. >_>
What's melee? .-.
Super Smash Bros Melee

> [{quoted}](name=Bergk,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T00:38:18.786+0000)
>
> Super Smash Bros Melee

best fighting game on GameCube btw lol

>best fighting game btw lol

FTFY
OOOOOOOH. That makes sense now.

> [{quoted}](name=Goddess Madoka,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=0010000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T00:40:34.778+0000)
>
> OOOOOOOH. That makes sense now.

Yeah, sorry, I could have been more clear in my original post  :P
thank you for at least looking at it. its a struggle x_x
Do you have colorblind mode enabled?

yes, it helps with a lot of things but these traps are just flat out impossible to see.

Keep in mind its hard for a colorblind mode to actually work unless they make 3 different versions of colorblind mode to apply to all 3 "major" types of colorblindness.

Of note: have you played Overwatch? They actually have complete colorblindness settings for all three types.
If what they do there works, it would be a good place for Riot to look for helping colorblind players able to play on a fair field.

I LOVE overwatches colorblindmode options, they are SUPER helpful and its nice thers always a vocal queue for anything happening as well so i never feel at a disadvantage.
Its normally not that bad in this game but i just could not see them during my recent match, didn't help that i was a zyra and well. 2 shots and i was dead ;;
League of Legends "colourblind" system is poor, unfortunately it only helps those who are Tritanopia. Deuteranopia and Protanopia will make no use of League's "colourblind mode".

I feel like colorblind mode only impacts things like health bar color and minimap icons. I could be wrong though, as I'm not colorblind. I just use colorblind mode because the yellow health bar stands out better for me.
Certain enemy attacks have their colors changed so they're more detectable. Singed poison is blue for example as opposed to brownish green in normal
Im sure if you want, you could modify the file to change the look of it. im not sure if riot would allow it but im sure if you messaged them they could send you a file to change

> [{quoted}](name=Defended,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-07T05:48:33.477+0000)
>
> Im sure if you want, you could modify the file to change the look of it. im not sure if riot would allow it but im sure if you messaged them they could send you a file to change

Oh, honey....
I've got monochromasia, and the colorblind mode does absolutely nothing for me, so I'm all for more visibilty! Colorblind people unite!
i would die if i had monochromasia. good lord x_x
what exactly is monochromasia? is it as bad as i think it is?

When you have monochromasia, you only see in shades of gray, no colors. So Red is gray, blue is gray, pink is gray, ect...

For the person, it's completely normal and there nothing wrong about it.
damn, that's serious
Its not a big deal to me, its just the way things are; everything is a shade of grey

> [{quoted}](name=Bunb0t,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T01:50:55.067+0000)
>
> Its not a big deal to me, its just the way things are; everything is a shade of grey
Riot Time Wizard also take a look
YOOO I FOUND THIS RN
enjoy https://www.facebook.com/Upworthy/videos/1331680856872769/

>

I dont know how to format

For reference, here's a  color scale.
http://www.color-blindness.com/wp-content/images/Protanopia-Color-Spectrum.jpg
And a doctored image of what Lunar Revel Caitlyn looks like with protanopia.
http://www.color-blindness.com/coblis/uploaded_images/lunar%20caitlyn_protanopia.jpg

Edit: I'm an idiot. The above pic is for allied Caitlyn traps. OP was having difficulty with enemy traps.
I stole this from a video on Tekk's channel. Surprisingly difficult to find enemy caitlyns with this skin.
http://www.color-blindness.com/coblis/uploaded_images/caitlyn%20traps_protanopia.jpg

Take this with a grain of salt by the way. Everyone's vision is different, especially people with color blindness

> [{quoted}](name=Thaurron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-07-07T15:44:49.722+0000)
>
> For reference, here's a  color scale.
> http://www.color-blindness.com/wp-content/images/Protanopia-Color-Spectrum.jpg
> And a doctored image of what Lunar Revel Caitlyn looks like with protanopia.
> http://www.color-blindness.com/coblis/uploaded_images/lunar%20caitlyn_protanopia.jpg

They look completely visible to me, im all for fixing this problem and i feel bad for people going through what OP are going through but that picture looks fine. i could easily see and play with her traps like that. is it just me or?

It's easy to see them when it's that close but when you're actually playing the game they'll be further back. When you zoom out of the image to scale with the game all you can pretty much see is a little dot and circle.

> [{quoted}](name=Twitch Main,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-07-07T18:29:38.469+0000)
>
> It's easy to see them when it's that close but when you're actually playing the game they'll be further back. When you zoom out of the image to scale with the game all you can pretty much see is a little dot and circle.

I scaled my screen to 33% where cait was about half the size i see her in game and still saw it pretty easily. No t trying to argue, just dont understand how this isnt clearly visible
Imagine if it's in a bush now.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=00090000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-07T18:38:01.467+0000)
>
> Imagine if it's in a bush now.

They're pretty hard to see in a bush regardless because theyre transparent, i just dont see the correlation. OP says they can NOT see anything but a small circle at any point and i can quite clearly see the entire trap in the graphic. im not being negative, i genuinely pity anyone who has to deal with a handicap like that, just trying to understand the picture lol

I'm with you here, totally sympathize with anyone that has dissability, visual or otherwise.  But I too find it easy to see them in that image.  I have to assume that it's a very poor representation of what OP is seeing in game.

Imagine if you had gotten used to being able to see the traps normally though and then all you saw was a little red circle with a dot in the middle.

This isn't "guy who already can't see caitlyn traps has harder time seeing caitlyn traps", this is "guy who has no problem seeing base skin caitlyn trips literally can't see lunar wraith caitlyn traps". I kinda wish he hadn't posted the picture because the only true litmus for what he experiences would be to play a game colorblind, and I don't think that kind of technology exists (which is probably why Riot misses stuff like this).

> [{quoted}](name=Battlecast Janna,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=00090000000000000001,timestamp=2016-07-07T18:57:20.867+0000)
>
> Imagine if you had gotten used to being able to see the traps normally though and then all you saw was a little red circle with a dot in the middle.
> 
> This isn't "guy who already can't see caitlyn traps has harder time seeing caitlyn traps", this is "guy who has no problem seeing base skin caitlyn trips literally can't see lunar wraith caitlyn traps". I kinda wish he hadn't posted the picture because the only true litmus for what he experiences would be to play a game colorblind, and I don't think that kind of technology exists (which is probably why Riot misses stuff like this).

You completely missed my point, i just wanna know if that is what it looks like to OP because it looks fairly normal to me. Is that picture an inaccurate represenation or am i the only one having an easy time seeing them in that picture?

it is patently an inaccurate representation because we can't know OPs specific conditions without seeing through his eyes, which was my point. based on his descriptions it sounds to me like the primary colors used to differentiate both the framework of the trap and the mechanics of the trap both are shades of the same color to OP, and the color he sees is the same/similar as the color of the ground in a lot of places in summoner's rift, making it essentially "disappear" for him. Since what was posted is just a sepia toned version of summoner's rift, it's not an exact representation of what OP sees.
I don't know anything about colorblindness, but I can imagine this is rough, so take my upvote.
fix your eyes then kid

Get the fuck out of here, you can't just go to someone with an impairment and say "fix your eyes then kid". That's pretty much like telling fully blind person "better not be blind kid HUEHUEHUE!" You see? It makes you look like an arrogant asshole.

> [{quoted}](name=Asudurga,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=00140001,timestamp=2016-07-08T03:19:44.182+0000)
>
> Get the fuck out of here, you can't just go to someone with an impairment and say "fix your eyes then kid". That's pretty much like telling fully blind person "better not be blind kid HUEHUEHUE!" You see? It makes you look like an arrogant asshole.

I hate to be a devil's advocate, but there is an option for fully blind ppl to get their eyesight back. Not completely sure about color blindness tho
Still honestly a dick move to tell people to "fix their eyes" when they can't without forking over cash for some miracle invention.

> [{quoted}](name=Asudurga,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LMEfZMPQ,comment-id=0014000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-08T03:24:04.384+0000)
>
> Still honestly a dick move to tell people to "fix their eyes" when they can't without forking over cash for some miracle invention.

I agree
Maybe you should fix your decision making first.
please direct me to a doctor who can fix this and maybe i would. unfortunantly that doesn't exist yet. But thanks for the tip.
